page.title: 07PEOPLE AND WORK
page.content: In the area a cattle farmer was seen ploughing a bit of land for mustard. The mustard is used for cover crop for pheasants. Mr Machin is the owner of Prospect Farm. Most of Mr Machins barns are used to store crops. Mr Machin sells his crops. Some crops are sold to go abroad. The rest of his barns are used to keep equipment. The manager of the chicken farm is Mr Pearl. The chicken farm belongs to Buxted,a well known supplier of oven ready chickens. The farmer looks after 70,000 chickens. The houses the chickens are kept in are called broilers. In each broiler there are two feeding machines.There are two broilers.The farm covers 37,267 square feet of land. Peter Lister is the game keeper of the Great Wood. He has a number of traps
